entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022
